The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 09 August is 2,826 (327.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 05 August, there were 19 new confirmed cases (2.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 July, there were 28 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 32% (9 fewer cases).
